meta.name: rights
meta.content: MapAlerter.com || Pin Point Alerts Ltd. || www.pinpointalerts.com

meta.name: description
meta.content: MapAlerter is a multi-channel alert service for Irish local authorities who wish to deliver instant alerts for specific events. MapAlerter is used by Councils to alert for Water Service Disruptions, Road Closures, Flood Warnings, Severe Weather Alerts, local planning activity and much more. Alerts are delivered by SMS Text Message, Email, Smartphone App for Android and iPhone, RSS Feed and Social Media channels such as Facebook and Twitter. MapAlerter is a free service and there is no cost to receive alerts through any channel.

meta.title: MapAlerter.com - Developer API
